document.discussion_title: Singapore's PM Lee to take medical leave until Aug 29 | The Edge Markets
document.topic_text: By Reuters / Reuters | August 22, 2016 : 4:01 PM MYT Translated by Google Translator: Translated by Google Translator: SINGAPORE (Aug 22): Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong will be on medical leave until Aug 29 on the advice of his doctors, his office said on Monday.
